group_1.textLeft: Pardon the intrusion.
…It doesn't seem like anyone's here.

group_1.textRight: 'Cause of the Witch...well, more like thanks@to the Witch, everyone's left.
It made the whole family split up.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, that's quite something…@Are you staying here today?

group_1.textRight: That I am.

group_1.narration: Every day we looked for someplace to stay…

group_1.textRight: …Huh? My house?
There's no fucking way we're doin' that!

group_1.narration: …So whenever we found a good spot,@we would roll right on in,@as the unwanted guests we were…
But…what made it strange is that@it was a different place every day.
It would be easier if we laid claim to one place@and made it all ours, like a home base,@so we wouldn't have to look so hard every day…

group_1.textRight: There we go.

group_1.textLeft: …What are you doing?

group_1.textRight: Trippin' the breakers so the power won't@come on.

group_1.textLeft: Erm…why…?

group_1.textRight: Just makin' some preparations!

group_1.textLeft: By preparations…you mean for the "Let's Ruin@Everything Plan"?

group_1.textRight: Gah, what kinda name is that…?

group_1.textLeft: It's cute, right?

group_1.textRight: Erm…

group_1.textLeft: So tripping the breakers is a part of what@we're doing next?

group_1.textRight: Ah, yeah…well, somethin' like that, kinda?
…Buuut, at the rate things are goin',@this'll take WAY too long…
I'm just gonna have to go the direct route@and use suggestions instead…

group_1.textLeft: Is that bad?

group_1.textRight: Well, I don't got much magic left…

group_1.textLeft: I see…magic…

group_1.textRight: Ahh, no way! This book! I missed it!

group_1.textLeft: A book?

group_1.textRight: Yep!
The two of us used to meet at a coffee shop,@remember?

group_1.textLeft: …Back when I was a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: Yeah…and I used to read this book to kill time@before you showed up.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yes, I remember you reading it one time!
You were completely absorbed into it even@as I was sitting down…

group_1.textRight: I was trying to get to a good stopping point.

group_1.textLeft: What book was that?

group_1.textRight: It's about how people aren't meant to lose.

group_1.textLeft: …You mean one of those sketchy@self-help books?

group_1.textRight: Naw, not that…@It's just a plain old novel.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm…maybe I should give it a read, too.@Can you turn the pages for me?

group_1.textRight: Sure thing! Here we go…

group_1.textLeft: *Yawn*
Jeez, I feel really sleepy somehow!

group_1.textRight: Huuuh?

group_1.textLeft: I know it's early, but can we go to bed now?@We have a big day ahead of us.

group_1.textRight: …Big day? Why?

group_1.textLeft: We need to find a lot of Witches!
